pages.title: Phase Anvil
pages.text: The $(item)Phase Anvil$() allows you to imbue equipment with the power of moon phases.$(br2)Each phase grants different bonuses when applied to armor or weapons.

pages.title: How to Use
pages.text: 1. Place the Phase Anvil$(br)2. Right-click with equipment$(br)3. Right-click with a Phase Sigil$(br)4. Supply mana$(br)5. Wait for the imbuing process$(br2)$(l)Shift + Right-click$() to remove the sigil.

pages.title: Moon Phases
pages.text: $(li)$(6)Full Moon$(): +15% Attack$(li)$(9)Waning Gibbous$(): +10% Magic$(li)$(b)Last Quarter$(): +12% Defense$(li)$(d)Waning Crescent$(): +8% Mana Regen$(li)$(8)New Moon$(): Stealth$(li)$(a)Waxing Crescent$(): +10% Speed$(li)$(e)First Quarter$(): +15% Mining$(li)$(6)Waxing Gibbous$(): +10% XP Gain

pages.title: Phase Sigils
pages.text: Craft $(item)Phase Sigils$() using Moonstone, Stardust, and Gold Ingots. Different combinations create sigils for different moon phases.$(br2)Sigils can stack up to level 3 on the same equipment for stronger effects!
